word: das Bestes, die There is no plural form for the singular noun "article bestes."
definition: The superlative form of a positive adjective, used to describe something of the highest quality or excellence. It is commonly used to express admiration or preference for a particular thing or person.

examples.german: Das ist das beste Buch, das ich je gelesen habe.
examples.english: This is the best book I have ever read.

examples.german: Er hat den besten Platz im Theater bekommen.
examples.english: He got the best seat in the theater.

examples.german: Sie hat das beste Ergebnis in der Pr√ºfung erzielt.
examples.english: She achieved the best result in the exam.

examples.german: Das ist das beste Restaurant in der Stadt.
examples.english: This is the best restaurant in town.

examples.german: Er hat den besten Job der Welt.
examples.english: He has the best job in the world.
